wf_workflow_version.description: workflow for cases currently in the middle of discussion
wf_workflow_version.name: Discussion In Progress Workflow
wf_workflow_version.on_cancel: // This script executes if the workflow is cancelled.// The global variable context_sys_id contains the sys_id of the cancelled workflow context.

wf_workflow.description: workflow for cases currently in the middle of discussion
wf_workflow.name: Discussion In Progress Workflow

wf_activity.name: Approval for early termination of discussion

sys_variable_value.value: // Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;

Approval for early termination of discussion

wf_activity.name: Notification of early termination of Discussion

sys_variable_value.value: // Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.
RE: Case No. ${number}; Stipulation to Terminate Discussion
RE: Case No. ${number}; Stipulation to Terminate Discussion
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.

activity.display_value: Notification of early termination of Discussion

RE: Case No. ${number}; Early Decision Opportunity
